```{r}
# SAIFI: System Average Interruption Frequency Index

library(dplyr)
# N_i / N_T
# N_i is the number of customers affected by each interruption
# N_T is the total number of customers served = 3,600,382

cust_served <- 3600382

outages <- filter(df, OUTAGEFLAG == 1)

SAIFI_calc(outages)
```
